thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com | 302 2
thread.title: bfsuetp

author: bfsuetp
title: bfsuetp
text: I have good experience on DHGate so far I have one order that has not shown up yet I was hoping this would not happen it is why I am stoping shopping on ebay hope that dhgate finds a way to get tracking on all orders for the buyers and sellers make it better for all most non tracking orders on ebay take to long to ship and hit and miss whether they show up at all ones that are tracked always show up
